author: Special Correspondent
V S
text:
CULTURE

Ulchemy: Life Transforming Programme, Akshi Hall, Venilla building, near Anjaneyar temple, Peelamedu,

6 p.m.

GENERAL

Avanashilingam University, SITRA and SIMA: Conference on Eco Textiles and Green Consumerism, 10 a.m.; refresher course on teaching mathematics to visually impaired students, 11 a.m.

Hindusthan Institute of Technology: Sciencetrix, 11 a.m.

PSG CAS: Visual Communication Department, Pathivugal annual event, 9.30 a.m.

Karpagam College of Engineering: Debate on Union Budget, 2 p.m.

NGP Institute of Technology: Meet the CEO V.R. Muthu of Idhayam Group, 11 a.m.

Coimbatore Institute of Management and Technology: Workshop on Hardware and Network, YRSK Technologies, 10 a.m.

SNS College of Engineering: Management Meet Arthasastra-16,

9.30 a.m.

Sree Narayana Guru College: Seminar on Behavioural Rights of Youth, 10.30 a.m.; talk on Challenges for entrepreneurs in Globalisation, 10.30 a.m.; seminar on Recent Trends in Marketing, 1.30 p.m.

Dhanalakshmi Srinivasan College of Engineering: Workshop on Android Applications, 9.30 a.m.

Hindusthan College of Arts and Science: “Exemplar 16” – Intercollegiate Management Meet, 10 a.m.

Hindusthan Institute of Technology and College of Engineering and Technology: Emerging Trends in Business, Economics and Management, 4 p.m.

SNR Sons College: Biospark 16 – Scientific session on Bio systems Engineering, 10 a.m.

Kovai Kalaimagal College of Arts and Science: Seminar on Financial Education, 10 a.m.
title: In Coimbatore Today
